name: Aglaris Cell
who: Aglaris Cell surge de la colaboración entre investigadores del grupo de biomateriales del IQS de Barcelona y el grupo de regulación de la Expresión y Estabilidad Genética en Células Madre de una institución de primer nivel.
what: El biorreactor Aglaris Facer 1.0 es nuestro primer producto. Este equipo es capaz de cultivar células de forma automática sin el uso de tripsina.

name: Álamo Consulting
who: ÁlamoConsulting es una compañía de consultoría especializada en Tecnologías de la Información.
what: Proyectos de consultoría: planes estratégicos y tecnológicos, planes de convergencia derivados de una fusión-reestructruación, rediseño de modelos de negocio, cuadros de mando, PMO, etc.

name: Albufera Energy Storage
who: La empresa lidera la Universidad de la Batería, una iniciativa para formar una red europea de profesionales involucrados en el campo del almacenamiento de electricidad e interesados en desarrollar proyectos de demostración de acuerdo a las directrices de la Comisión Europea para el programa H2020.
what: Albufera Energy Storage se encuentra inmersa en el desarrollo de una batería recargable de Aluminio-aire susceptible de ser utilizada en el mundo de la energía inteligente.

name: Allinky Biopharma
who: Allinky Biopharma es una spin off académica dedicada al descubrimiento y desarrollo de fármacos para el tratamiento de patologías relacionadas con la inflamación crónica, el envejecimiento celular y el cáncer.
what: Allinky desarrolla nuevos fármacos capaces de modular las señales moleculares anormales responsables de estas enfermedades y, por lo tanto, contribuir a restaurar la expresión genética normal de la célula.

name: Aptus Biotech
who: Compañía biotecnológica especializada en la selección y la identificación de aptámeros y en el desarrollo de nuevas terapias y aplicaciones diagnósticas basadas en esta tecnología.
what: Aptus Biotech ofrece un catálogo de aptámeros desarrollados por la propia compañía y en colaboraciones con otras empresas y centros de investigación.

name: Aratech
who: Aratech es una startup  dedicada al desarrollo de aplicaciones en la nube y aplicaciones móviles basadas en software SaaS en cloud.
what: Diseñamos e implementamos herramientas tecnológicas personalizadas y adaptadas a diferentes entornos y necesidades tan variadas como sistemas de pago, gamificación, redes sociales, divulgación científica o procesado de imágenes y datos para análisis clínico.

name: Aselcis Consulting
who: ASELCIS Consulting es una empresa con una amplia experiencia en la implantación de sistemas de gestión empresarial en los ámbitos de ERP, CRM, Gestión Documental y Business Intelligence.
what: Aselcis ofrece soluciones de Business Intelligence y de Gestión Documental donde la accesibilidad, la escalabilidad, la personalización o la seguridad de los datos, son una garantía.

name: Atelgraphics
who: Allgraphics es una empresa que se centra en el desarrollo de software científico.
what: AtelGraphics realiza y visualiza simulaciones atomísticas cuánticas.

name: Aunergy
who: Aunergy is specialised in operational and advanced control software for solar thermoelectric power plants.
what: The aim of the solutions offered by Aunergy is to increase efficiency and safety in thermo-solar plants thanks to integrated simulation, control and operational systems.

name: BioAssays
who: Bioassays is a basic and advanced research platform specialised in the field of biochemistry and the interactions of proteins, as well as cell and molecular biology.
what: BioAssays offers its proven ability to successfully identify and discover in vitro, and to functionally validate in vivo.

name: Bioecm
who: BIOECM specialises in the safety of electronic documents.
what: Issuing and managing documents, long-term filing of documents and certified digitisation.

name: Biomedica Molecular Medicine
who: Biomedica Molecular Medicine develops molecular tools designed to help doctors make clinical decisions.
what: The company also provides access to latest generation equipment in order to work in all areas of molecular biology: NGS, genomics, microRNAs, proteomics and metabolomics.

name: Biomol Informatics
who: Biomol-Informatics´ scientists are experts in the use of QM/MM (molecular dynamics and quantum mechanics/molecular mechanics).
what: Biomol-Informatics is specialised in studying and rationally designing pharmaceuticals for ATPases and GTPases through computational simulations.

name: Ciberned
who: Ciberned is composed of over 50 research groups, led by one main researcher. More than 500 scientists from universities, hospitals and the CSIC are part of Ciberned.
what: CIBERNED (Centre for Network Biomedical Research on Neurodegenerative Diseases) is a public consortium which aims to promote and collaborate with scientific research and the problems related to neurodegenerative diseases.

name: Civagen
who: CIVAGEN BIOMEDICAL is a biomedical company.
what: CIVAGEN BIOMEDICAL which specialises in cutting-edge technology and Digital Image smart systems for early detection pathology diagnosis.

name: Dart
who: Dart (Design, Research & Technology) investiga en nuevos productos y aplicaciones de big data.
what: Nos centramos en escalabilidad en el procesamiento de información y servicios en la nube.

name: Diomune
who: Diomune´s technological innovation is based on the discovery of a family of immunomodulatory compounds which have an effect on receptors linked to innate immunity.
what: Diomune is specialised in research and development of new immunological treatments which can be applied to human and animal health for infectious, inflammatory and autoimmune diseases.

name: Dynamimed
who: Laboratory animal diagnosis and biological samples
what: DYNAMIMED specialises in health diagnosis and animal monitoring in biological material intended for biomedical research.

name: EPMTIC
who: EPMTIC (Efficient Project Management of Information and Communications Technology). Its personalised infrastructure and project engineering solutions go from designing,
what: specialises in providing services and developing solutions related to information and communications technology.

name: Exaccta
who: Exaccta is the first worldwide app which automatically extracts all the data needed to manage accounting in real time simply by taking a picture of all invoices and tickets,
what: Exaccta allow the user to manage his accounting and tax payments if he is a professional (Exaccta TAX), monitor a budget if he is part of a family (Exaccta HOME) or generate a report on monthly expenses if he is an employee (Exaccta XPENS).

name: Geniality
who: GENIALITY is a biotechnological company devoted to applying diagnosis techniques to the field of reproductive genetics.
what: GENIALITY is specialised in Preimplantation Genetic Diagnosis (PGD).

name: Gnanomat
who: Gnanomat es una empresa que emplea una tecnología propia mediante la cual es posible obtener materiales dopados con nanopartículas metálicas en un proceso escalable industrialmente,
what: Gnanomat ha desarrollado una novedosa tecnología para la producción de grafeno y de nanomateriales derivados mediante un procedimiento más versátil y económico a las actuales propuestas del mercado.

name: H2O Mobile
who: H2o Mobile is an independent telecommunications operator aimed at residential customers and companies.
what: The main goal of this business project is to guarantee and make it easier for everybody to have access to new technologies and to establish a national operator.

name: Halotech DNA
who: HALOTECH has several products on the market which analyse human (Halosperm) and animal (Halomax) DNA fragmentation.
what: HALOTECH develops, produces and commercialises products related to SCD technology (Sperm Chromatin Dispersion test)

name: IARLabs
who: IAR Labs is a company in the technological sector specialised in smartphone and tablet Augmented Reality apps.
what: These are dynamic presentations based on pictures taken by a camera with extra graphic elements. The understanding of recipients not accustomed to interpreting dimensions and shapes on a flat surface is improved.

name: Ibercat
who: IBERCAT offers comprehensive and personalised catalytic solutions.
what: The company specialises in fuel cell components, hydrogen production, biofuels and products derived from biomass.

name: Ica2
who: CA2 – Innovación y Tecnología is a company focused on the development and application of technological and methodological solutions.
what: CA2 implant models of knowledge and R+D management and organisational intelligence models in institutions.

name: Innocv
who: INNOCV Solutions specialises in developing .NET and Java applications in the fields of logistical management, retail and industrial production.
what: INNOCV identify, evaluate and implement technological logistical solutions which enable the company to increase workers´ productivity,

name: ITS-security
who: ITS Security is an engineering and counselling IT company specialised in cybersecurity and intelligence for industrial monitoring systems.
what: It offers the chance to become aware of possible vulnerabilities and security breaches,

name: Mygen
who: MyGEN Laboratorio is a private company working mainly in the fields of Human Health and Applied Microbiology.
what: Its main activity focuses on developing and commercialising technologies that can make genetic and microbiological analysis which are very accurate and problem-solving with a minimum response time.
